title: parithApamula dIrchi
sahitya:
paritApamula dIrcci pAlimpumayya

anupallavi

parikarmagala ananta padmanAbha murahara paramESTi vinuta surapAlaka dIparamaina

caraNam

 carAcara patara nIdu caraNamulE gatiyani ni karamu sannidi nE  neranammi 
vaccitini niratamuga brOcuTa nIkarudA parama puruSa kara tapamugala munivara
manasuku sukhakara nirupama surasamu karivarada shrInivAsa
